enumeratorHelp:
Pakatha masekandi 60 kapena wophunzira akatsiriza kuwerenga ndime m'masekandi zosaposera 60, chotsani ndimeyo patsogolo pa ophunzira ndipo werengani funso loyamba.

Mpatseni wophunzira masekandi 15 kuti ayankhe funsolo, chongani yankho la wophunzira ndi kumuwerenga funso lotsatira.

Werengani mafunso a mzere uliwonse mpaka pamene ophunzira walekeza kuwerenga.
studentDialog: Tsopano ndikufunsa mafunso angapo okhudza nkhani yomwe wawerenga.
questions: Kodi ndi sukulu ziti zinkasewera mpira? [Kapeni ndi Chimutu]
Chifukwa chiyani a Kapeni anakonzekera kwambiri? [kuti apambane]
Kodi chidachititsa a Chimutu kuti alowe mâ€™bwalo akuvina ndi kuimba ndi chiyani? [amasangalalira chigoli, sukulu yawo idagoletsa chigoli, oyimbira adayimba wezulo]
Kodi oyimbira mpira adaonetsa khalidwe lanji? [lokondera, losadziwa]
Ukuganiza kuti ndi chifukwa chiyani mpira udapitilira? [A Kapeni amadzidalira, a Kapeni adakonzekera kwambiri, aphunzitsi adawalimbikitsa]
